title: Shout it from the Housetops
description: Founder of the world’s first and most influential Christian television network, host of The 700 Club for over 30 years, former presidential candidate, founder of both the Christian Coalition and the American Center for Law and Justice, and unchallenged leader of the "Christian Right," Pat Robertson is an important figure by anyone’s standard. Pat’s own words about how it all began are an irresistible and unforgettable reading experience.
author: Pat Robertson
